Welcome to the internal documentation for **`google-auth-rewired`** â€” a lightweight, execution-first toolkit that simplifies authenticating to Google APIs in Python.

This folder contains documentation for usage, scopes, service accounts, impersonation, and advanced workflows.

## ğŸ—‚ï¸ Docs Structure

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
